entities.name: ivanova
entities.description: One of the Bulgarian Beaters who dropped the Quaffle to Moran.

entities.name: moran
entities.description: Received the Quaffle from Ivanova and then dropped it after being hit by a Bludger.

entities.name: volkov
entities.description: A Bulgarian Beater who swung hard at a passing Bludger with his small club.

entities.name: levski
entities.description: Caught the Quaffle after it was dropped by Moran.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Announced Troy's score and the stadium's reaction to it.

entities.name: troy
entities.description: Scored a point in the Quidditch World Cup match.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Watched the Quidditch World Cup match through his Omnioculars.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Danced and cheered for Troy's score.

entities.name: ireland
entities.description: Leading in the Quidditch World Cup match with a score of 10-0.

entities.name: bulgaria
entities.description: Playing against Ireland in the Quidditch World Cup match.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The ball used in the Quidditch World Cup match.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A ball that was hit by Volkov and then knocked into Moran's path.

entities.name: omnioculars
entities.description: Harry's device for watching the Quidditch World Cup match.

entities.name: leprechauns
entities.description: Watching from the sidelines and forming a shamrock when Troy scored.

relationships.description: Troy scored a point for Ireland in the Quidditch World Cup match.
Levski caught the Quaffle after it was dropped by Moran.
Volkov hit the Bludger with his small club.
Moran dropped the Quaffle after being hit by a Bludger.
Harry used his Omnioculars to watch the Quidditch World Cup match.
Bagman announced Troy's score for Ireland in the Quidditch World Cup match.
